Question: AWOL Vision CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
AWOL Vision

Vanish Laser TV

- All-in-one triple-laser projection television
- Includes LTV-3500 Pro projector, floor-rising screen, and motorized cabinet
- Simplifies projector placement and disrupts home layout
- Sizes available: 100''-120'' and 100''-150''
- Founded in 2020, specializing in ultra short throw, triple-laser projection technology
- Website: www.awolvision.com
Summary_cn:
AWOL Vision

消失激光电视

-一体化三激光投影电视
-包括LTV-3500 Pro投影机、地板升降屏幕和电动柜
-简化投影机布置，改变家庭布局
-可选择的尺寸：100''-120'' 和 100''-150''
-成立于2020年，专注于超短焦、三激光投影技术
-网址：www.awolvision.com
